seo.title: Translation of your video from German into English in the Vidby service
seo.description: Online dubbing from German into English and from English into German for your video in the Vidby service using our modern and high quality algorithms.

content:
Translation and Dub from German to English

Introduction

Our world consists of billions of people who communicate in different languages, and sometimes, it is getting challenging to reach the global community properly because of the language barrier. You probably know that videos are the most attractive way to reach the needed people. Still, some companies or governmental institutions struggle while translating their video into different languages, especially when dealing with the language pair of German-English.

In this short article, we will answer the question of how to translate a video from German to English at VidBy? In addition, you will get a quick overview of the benefits provided while dealing with this innovative online video translator service.

The popularity and specifications of the language pair

It is one of the most popular language pairs in Europe for a few reasons. First of all, English is the first world’s spoken language, and German is the language spoken by the citizens of the most influential country in the EU. So, it is evident that there is a high demand for translation and dubbing videos from German into English and vice versa. The difficulty lies in that German have a few dialects that are hard to learn, and the message will be clear if you can apply these dialects to the video translation process.

With the help of VidBy, it is easy to process such a German to English video translation, and below, we explain to you the algorithm of the video translation from German into English.

How to translate from German to English: The algorithm of work

Under normal circumstances, video translation is a highly complicated process that involves many sides, like professional translators and artists. But with the help of innovative technologies, it has become easy to translate any video from German into English. The algorithm for video translation is the following:

  • Upload your video or put a direct link to a video you want to translate and dub;
  • Specify your order (add some details that the service can do an excellent job);
  • Pay for the translation and dubbing (it is possible to pay via Visa/Mastercard, ApplePay/Google Pay, and SWIFT transfers);
  • Wait for the result to download the translated video.

And that is all. You do not need to do anything more because the service will make everything for you. So, this is the way how to translate German video to English.

Additional features of VidBy

VidBy wants to provide its clients with the best possible services and the best possible results. So, besides the AI-powered software, the service has developed a few additional features that will guarantee a great experience with this service while having astonishing results.

Add a drop of emotions

Without an emotional tone, every video is boring. Thus, VidBy has started to develop a feature that allows every customer to apply different emotions to the translated videos. At the current stage, it is possible to add the following emotions:

  • Fear;
  • Anger;
  • Joy;
  • Sadness;
  • Surprise;
  • Disgust.

With the help of the emotions mentioned above, it is possible to translate German video to English and make it more realistic.

Speech synthesizer

One more feature that makes your translated videos even more realistic is the capability to automatically generate different voices, such as the voice of a child, teenager, adult, or senior. So, there are enough options to choose from to make your translated videos sound realistic and natural.

What are the benefits of working with VidBy?

Besides the features mentioned above, the video translation service will benefit you more. So, let us consider the most popular ones.

Quick translation result

For many companies, governmental institutions, and universities, the delivery time of the video translation always matters. So, the first benefit of using the video and audio translator services of VidBy is precisely this aspect. While other video translation platforms can translate German video to English within a day or even longer (depending on the video’s length), VidBy can do the same thing way faster.

With the help of AI-powered technology, there is no need to look for professional translators and artists. The technology does not need this, and a one-minute video will be translated within two minutes.

Guaranteed quality of the services

The fast delivery of the German to English video translation is a great thing, but what about the quality of these videos? Even though the software does every piece of work for you, the quality of the video translation and dubbing from German into English is on the highest level. Additionally, the video translation service has a few unique features in its arsenal so that the final result will be even more realistic.

Low cost

As many video translation and dubbing services from German to English are pretty expensive, the services of VidBy will help you reduce these expenses without losing the quality of the translated videos. And the low cost is evident because there is no need to hire different specialists, like translators and actors, to do the work. 

A variety of subscriptions

There is an opportunity to save even more money for people who know that they have a great need for translation and dubbing many videos. The service offers three subscriptions (Basic, Extended, and Professional) suitable for customers with different demands.

An opportunity to edit

While purchasing the Professional subscription, you will unlock one more feature - to edit the transcripts independently. This feature allows you to produce more quality content and send the ideas of your videos more accurately.

A step-by-step guide: how to get a translated video from German into French?

VidBy is an innovative video translation service that allows everyone to translate and dub videos of any length and complexity. So, let us figure out how to translate German video to English with the help of a few elementary steps.

  • Step 1. First and foremost, you need to visit the official website of VidBy. It is one of the most straightforward actions that is required.
  • Step 2. On the website's main page, you will notice a particular line above the red button Start, where you need to put a link to the video you want to translate. You can also upload the video from your device. It is up to you.
  • Step 3. The service will request you to add specific details. These details include selecting the original language of the video, selecting the language you want to translate and dub your video into, the selection of voices and their number (it is possible to add up to 10 different voices), etc.
  • Step 4. And to initiate the process of video translation and dubbing, the service will request you to pay for its services first. The total price of the order will be displayed on the page when you complete all the specification processes.
  • Step 5. This step requires just patience and nothing more because you need to wait until the AI-based software translates your video from German into English. If you have uploaded a short video, the delivery time will be fast. In terms of longer video fragments, you will need to wait more time, respectively.

So, you know how to translate a video from German to English and vice versa, and there is nothing complicated about this process.

FAQ

  1. How to translate and dub German videos into English?

There are many ways you can translate and dub your videos from German and English and vice versa. You can either use a traditional approach and hire professional artists and translators or an innovative way that does not involve people at all. VidBy uses AI-powered software that simplifies the process of translating and dubbing any videos from German into English. The only things you need to do are: to upload your video (or put a direct link to the video), specify your order details, and pay for the video translation service. Then, you will need to wait for the outcome and download the translated video to your device.

  1. How long does it take to translate videos from German into English at VidBy?

VidBy offers truly reliable video translation services and a competitive delivery time. The developers put a lot of effort into developing an AI-based software capable of translating any German video into English and vice versa 1000x faster than some other services. With the help of the software, you can dub and translate your video extremely fast - a one-minute video fragment will be ready in two minutes. So, you can calculate how much time the service takes to translate your videos from German into English, or the video service makes it on its own after paying the order.

  1. Is the quality of the translation good enough?

VidBy uses an innovative approach to video dubbing and translation based on AI-powered software. Thanks to this software, the quality of any video translation are great. What is more, the developers of VidBy try their best and develop a feature that allows them to add an emotional tone to videos. The list of these emotions is limited and consists of six emotions: anger, sadness, joy, fear, disgust, and surprise. However, it will be possible to apply even more emotions shortly. So, every customer gets translated videos that are almost impossible to distinguish from the translation made by real people.

  1. How much does the service of video translation at VidBy cost?

It is always interesting to know the cost of video translation services. You may assume that this process may be pretty expensive because it involves many people (professional artists and translators). With the help of VidBy, you can easily reduce the price of translation of your videos from German into English and vice versa due to the absence of the need to hire these specialists. So, the price is affordable for everyone. However, there is one more way to reduce the price - try out one out of three subscriptions, which are suitable for people who deal with the need for video translation regularly.
